file.name: articles.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: '@viron/example-nodejs articles'
  description: articles api specifications
  x-pages:
    - id: article
      group: 管理画面/入稿
      title: 記事
      description: |
        # 記事情報の管理
        記事データの **入稿・更新・削除** を行います。
      contents:
        - title: 記事
          type: table
          operationId: listArticles
          pagination: true
          resourceId: article

tags:
  - name: article

paths:
  /articles:
    get:
      operationId: listArticles
      tags:
        - article
      summary: list articles
      description: 記事一覧
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/PagerSizeQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/PagerPageQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/SortQueryParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ArticleIdQueryParam'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleListWithPager'
      security:
        - jwt: []

    post:
      operationId: createArticle
      tags:
        - article
      summary: create article
      description: 記事作成
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleCreatePayload'
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Article'
      security:
        - jwt: []

  /articles/{articleId}:
    put:
      operationId: updateArticle
      tags:
        - article
      summary: update article
      description: 記事更新
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ArticleIdPathParam'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleUpdatePayload'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []

    delete:
      operationId: removeArticle
      tags:
        - article
      summary: remove article
      description: 記事削除
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ArticleIdPathParam'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []

components:
  parameters:
    ArticleIdPathParam:
      name: articleId
      in: path
      schema:
        type: string
      required: true

    ArticleIdQueryParam:
      name: articleId
      in: query
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false

  schemas:
    ArticleListWithPager:
      allOf:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/Pager'
        - type: object
          properties:
            list:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleList'
          required:
            - list

    ArticleList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Article'

    Article:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: ID
          type: string
        title:
          description: タイトル
          type: string
        body:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleBody'
        createdAt:
          $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/CreatedAt'
        updatedAt:
          $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/UpdatedAt'
      required:
        - id
        - title
        - body

    ArticleCreatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        title:
          description: タイトル
          type: string
        body:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleBody'
      required:
        - title
        - body

    ArticleUpdatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        title:
          description: タイトル
          type: string
        body:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleBody'
      required:
        - title
        - body

    ArticleBody:
      description: 本文
      type: array
      items:
        oneOf:
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleLinkArea'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleTextArea'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleHeadingTextArea'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleTextButtonArea'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArticleRelatedArticleArea'

    ArticleLinkArea:
      type: object
      properties:
        linkArea:
          type: string
          description: リンクURL
      required:
        - linkArea

    ArticleTextArea:
      type: object
      properties:
        textArea:
          type: string
          description: テキストエリア
      required:
        - textArea

    ArticleHeadingTextArea:
      type: object
      properties:
        headingTextArea:
          type: object
          properties:
            level:
              type: string
              description: レベル
              enum:
                - h2
                - h3
                - h4
            text:
              type: string
              description: テキスト
          description: 見出し文字
          required:
            - level
            - text
      required:
        - headingTextArea

    ArticleTextButtonArea:
      type: object
      properties:
        textButtonArea:
          type: object
          properties:
            text:
              type: string
              description: テキスト
            link:
              type: string
              description: リンクURL
          description: テキストボタン
          required:
            - text
            - link
      required:
        - textButtonArea

    ArticleRelatedArticleArea:
      type: object
      properties:
        relatedArticleArea:
          type: object
          properties:
            relatedArticles:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                properties:
                  text:
                    type: string
                    description: 見出しテキスト
                  link:
                    type: string
                    description: リンクURL
                required:
                  - text
                  - link
              minItems: 1
              maxItems: 99
          required:
            - relatedArticles
      required:
        - relatedArticleArea

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /articles/{articleId}: put: operation "updateArticle": security: parse operation security: unknown security schema "jwt"
